00023 /* Protocol structure
00024  * ------------------
00025  * --------------------------------------------
00026  * |0xFE|0xFE|CMD|LENGTH|DATA[0]..DATA[n]|0xFD|
00027  * --------------------------------------------
00028  * After each message an ACK should be sent back to the computer. If no other data
00029  * is returned then just an ACK message containing the checksum, otherwise data that
00030  * should be sent back with the checksum retrieved as the DATA[0].
00031  */
00032 
00033 //Debug flag for the computer communication protocol
00034 //#define COM_DEBUG

00056 #define COMPUTER_RX_BUFFER_LENGTH       128
00057 
00059 #define COMPUTER_TX_BUFFER_LENGTH       20
00060 
00062 #define COMPUTER_INTERFACE_FIXED_SIZE   5
00063 
00065 #define COMPUTER_COMM_PREAMBLE  0xFE
00067 #define COMPUTER_COMM_POSTAMBLE 0xFD
00069 #define COMPUTER_COMM_ACK                               0xFA
00071 #define COMPUTER_COMM_NACK                      0xFB
00072 
00073 
00075 #define COMPUTER_COMM_FLAG_SETUP_MODE                   0
00077 #define COMPUTER_COMM_FLAG_FOUND_PREAMBLE       1
00079 #define COMPUTER_COMM_FLAG_DATA_IN_RX_BUF       2
00080 
00082 #define COMPUTER_COMM_ENTER_BOOTLOADER          0x01
00084 #define CTRL_REBOOT                                                                                             0x02
00086 #define CTRL_GET_FIRMWARE_REV                                                   0x03
00088 #define CTRL_DONE                                                                                                       0x04
00089 
00091 #define CTRL_SET_TIME                                                                           0x10
00093 #define CTRL_SET_ANT_DATA                                                                       0x11
00095 #define CTRL_CREATE_EEPROM_TABLE                                        0x12
00097 #define CTRL_SET_RX_ANT_DATA                                                    0x13
00099 #define CTRL_SET_RADIO_SETTINGS                                         0x14
00101 #define CTRL_SET_DEVICE_SETTINGS                                        0x15
00103 #define CTRL_SET_BAND_DATA                                                              0x16
00105 #define CTRL_SET_EXT_INPUT                                                              0x17
00107 #define CTRL_SET_SEQUENCER_SETTINGS                             0x18
00108 
00110 #define CTRL_SET_RADIO_SETTINGS_SAVE    0x01
00112 #define CTRL_SET_RADIO_SETTINGS_ALL             0x02
00113 
00115 #define CTRL_SET_ANT_DATA_SAVE                                          0x01
00117 #define CTRL_SET_ANT_DATA_TEXT                                          0x02
00119 #define CTRL_SET_ANT_DATA_SUB_MENU_TYPE         0x03
00121 #define CTRL_SET_ANT_DATA_ANT_FLAGS                             0x04
00123 #define CTRL_SET_ANT_DATA_COMB_ALLOWED          0x05
00125 #define CTRL_SET_ANT_DATA_ANT_OUT_STR                   0x06
00127 #define CTRL_SET_ANT_ROTATOR_DATA                                       0x07
00129 #define CTRL_SET_ANT_DEFAULT_INDEX                              0x08
00131 #define CTRL_SET_ANT_SUB_MENU_DATA                              0x09
00133 #define CTRL_SET_ANT_SUB_MENU_TEXT                              0x0A
00135 #define CTRL_SET_ANT_SUB_MENU_OUTPUT_STR  0x0B
00136 
00138 #define CTRL_SET_BAND_DATA_LIMITS                                       0x01
00140 #define CTRL_SET_BAND_DATA_LOW_OUT_STR          0x02
00142 #define CTRL_SET_BAND_DATA_HIGH_OUT_STR         0x03
00144 #define CTRL_SET_BAND_DATA_SAVE                                         0x07
00145 
00147 #define CTRL_SET_RX_ANT_DATA_TEXT                                               0x01
00149 #define CTRL_SET_RX_ANT_DATA_ANT_OUT_STR                0x02
00151 #define CTRL_SET_RX_ANT_DATA_BAND_OUT_STR               0x03
00153 #define CTRL_SET_RX_ANT_DATA_SAVE                                               0x07
00154 
00156 #define CTRL_SET_DEVICE_SETTINGS_NETWORK                0x01
00158 #define CTRL_SET_POWERMETER_SETTINGS                            0x02
00160 #define CTRL_SET_DEVICE_SETTINGS_OTHER                  0x03
00162 #define CTRL_SET_DEVICE_SETTINGS_EXT_INPUTS     0x04
00164 #define CTRL_SET_DEVICE_SETTINGS_SAVE                           0x07
00165 
00167 #define CTRL_SET_SEQUENCER_SAVE                                 0x01
00169 #define CTRL_SET_SEQUENCER_FOOTSWITCH           0x02
00171 #define CTRL_SET_SEQUENCER_COMPUTER                     0x03
00173 #define CTRL_SET_SEQUENCER_RADIO_SENSE  0x04
00174 
00176 #define CTRL_SET_DEVICE_SETTINGS_EXT_INPUTS             0x05
00178 #define CTRL_SET_DEVICE_SETTINGS_SAVE                                   0x07
00179 
00181 #define CTRL_SET_EXT_KEYPAD_FUNCTIONS                   0x01
00182 
00184 typedef struct {
00186         char *tx_buffer;
00188         char *tx_buffer_start;
00190         unsigned int tx_buffer_length;
00192         char *rx_buffer;
00194         char *rx_buffer_start;
00196         unsigned char data_in_tx_buffer;
00198         unsigned char flags;
00200         unsigned char command;
00202         unsigned char length;
00204         unsigned int count;
00205 } computer_comm_struct;
00206 
00208 computer_comm_struct computer_comm;
00209 
00211 struct_antenna *antenna_ptr;
00212 
00214 struct_rx_antennas *rx_antenna_ptr;
00215 
00217 struct_band *band_ptr;
00218 
00220 struct_setting *settings_ptr;
00221 
00223 struct_ptt *ptt_sequencer_ptr;
00224 
00226 struct_radio_settings *radio_settings_ptr;
00227 
00229 struct_sub_menu_array *sub_menu_array_ptr[4];
00230 
00232 void (*bootloader_start)(void) = (void *)0x1FE00;
00233 
00235 void computer_interface_init(void) {
00236         // Setup the RX buffer
00237         computer_comm.rx_buffer = (char *)malloc(COMPUTER_RX_BUFFER_LENGTH);
00238         computer_comm.rx_buffer_start = computer_comm.rx_buffer;
00239         
00240         computer_comm.tx_buffer = (char *)malloc(COMPUTER_TX_BUFFER_LENGTH);
00241         computer_comm.tx_buffer_start = computer_comm.tx_buffer;
00242         
00243         computer_comm.data_in_tx_buffer = 0;
00244 }
00245 
00247 void computer_interface_send_data(void) {
00248         if (computer_comm.data_in_tx_buffer == 1) {
00249                 for (int i=0;i<computer_comm.tx_buffer_length;i++)
00250                         usart1_transmit(computer_comm.tx_buffer_start[i]);
00251                 
00252                 computer_comm.tx_buffer = computer_comm.tx_buffer_start;
00253                 computer_comm.tx_buffer_length = 0;
00254 
00255                 computer_comm.data_in_tx_buffer = 0;
00256         }
00257 }
00258 
00263 void computer_interface_send(unsigned char command, unsigned int length, char *data) {
00264         computer_comm.tx_buffer[0] = COMPUTER_COMM_PREAMBLE;
00265         computer_comm.tx_buffer[1] = COMPUTER_COMM_PREAMBLE;
00266         computer_comm.tx_buffer[2] = command;
00267         computer_comm.tx_buffer[3] = length;
00268         int i;
00269         for (i=0;i<length;i++)
00270                 computer_comm.tx_buffer[4+i] = data[i];
00271                 
00272         computer_comm.tx_buffer[4+i] = COMPUTER_COMM_POSTAMBLE;
00273         
00274         computer_comm.tx_buffer_length = COMPUTER_INTERFACE_FIXED_SIZE+length;
00275                         
00276         computer_comm.data_in_tx_buffer = 1;
00277 }
00278 
00280 void computer_interface_send_ack(void) {
00281         computer_comm.tx_buffer[0] = COMPUTER_COMM_PREAMBLE;
00282         computer_comm.tx_buffer[1] = COMPUTER_COMM_PREAMBLE;
00283         computer_comm.tx_buffer[2] = COMPUTER_COMM_ACK;
00284         computer_comm.tx_buffer[3] = 0x00;
00285         computer_comm.tx_buffer[4] = COMPUTER_COMM_POSTAMBLE;
00286         
00287         computer_comm.tx_buffer_length = 5;
00288         computer_comm.data_in_tx_buffer = 1;
00289 }
00290 
00292 void computer_interface_send_nack(void) {
00293         computer_comm.tx_buffer[0] = COMPUTER_COMM_PREAMBLE;
00294         computer_comm.tx_buffer[1] = COMPUTER_COMM_PREAMBLE;
00295         computer_comm.tx_buffer[2] = COMPUTER_COMM_NACK;
00296         computer_comm.tx_buffer[3] = 0x00;
00297         computer_comm.tx_buffer[4] = COMPUTER_COMM_POSTAMBLE;
00298 
00299         computer_comm.tx_buffer_length = 5;
00300         computer_comm.data_in_tx_buffer = 1;
00301 }
00302 
00304 void computer_interface_parse_data(void) {
00305         unsigned char ptr_pos=2;
00306         
00307         if (computer_comm.flags & (1<<COMPUTER_COMM_FLAG_DATA_IN_RX_BUF)) {
00308                 if (computer_comm.command == CTRL_SET_TIME) {
00309                         ds1307_set_time(computer_comm.rx_buffer_start);
00310                         
00311                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00312                 }
00313                 else if (computer_comm.command == COMPUTER_COMM_ENTER_BOOTLOADER) {
00314                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00315                         
00316                         //Jump to the bootloader application section
00317                         bootloader_start();
00318                 }
00319                 else if (computer_comm.command == CTRL_REBOOT) {
00320                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00321                         computer_interface_deactivate_setup();
00322                         
00323                         do {
00324                                 wdt_enable(WDTO_15MS);
00325                                 for(;;){}
00326                         } 
00327                         while(0);
00328                 }
00329                 else if (computer_comm.command == CTRL_GET_FIRMWARE_REV) {
00330                         computer_interface_send(CTRL_GET_FIRMWARE_REV, strlen(FIRMWARE_REV), FIRMWARE_REV);
00331                 }
00332                 else if (computer_comm.command == CTRL_DONE) {
00333                         computer_interface_send(CTRL_DONE, 0, 0);
00334                 }
00335                 else if (computer_comm.command == CTRL_SET_ANT_DATA) {
00336                         switch(computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[0]) {
00337                                 case CTRL_SET_ANT_DATA_TEXT:
00338                                         antenna_ptr->antenna_text_length[(int)computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2]] = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[3];
00339                                         
00340                                         if (computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[3] == 0)
00341                                                 antenna_ptr->antenna_text[(int)computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2]][0] = 0;
00342                                         else
00343                                                 for (unsigned char i=0;i<computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[3];i++)
00344                                                         antenna_ptr->antenna_text[(int)computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2]][i] = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[4+i];
00345                                         
00346                                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00347                                         break;
00348                                 case CTRL_SET_ANT_DATA_SUB_MENU_TYPE: 
00349                                         antenna_ptr->sub_menu_type[0] = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[1];
00350                                         antenna_ptr->sub_menu_type[1] = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2];
00351                                         antenna_ptr->sub_menu_type[2] = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[3];
00352                                         antenna_ptr->sub_menu_type[3] = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[4];
00353                                         
00354                                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00355                                         break;
00356                                 case CTRL_SET_ANT_DATA_ANT_FLAGS:
00357                                         antenna_ptr->antenna_flag[0] = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2];
00358                                         antenna_ptr->antenna_flag[1] = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[3];
00359                                         antenna_ptr->antenna_flag[2] = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[4];
00360                                         antenna_ptr->antenna_flag[3] = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[5];
00361                                         
00362                                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00363                                         break;
00364                                 case CTRL_SET_ANT_DATA_COMB_ALLOWED:
00365                                         antenna_ptr->antenna_comb_allowed = (computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[1]<<8) | computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2];
00366                                                                         
00367                                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00368                                         break;
00369                                 case CTRL_SET_ANT_DATA_ANT_OUT_STR:
00370                                         //Antenna index bit is use for which combination that should be chosen
00371                                         antenna_ptr->antenna_output_length[(int)computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[1]] = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2];
00372                                         
00373                                         for (int i=0;i<computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2];i++) {
00374                                                 antenna_ptr->antenna_comb_output_str[(int)computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[1]][i] = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[3+i];
00375                                         }
00376                                         
00377                                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00378                                         break;
00379                                 case CTRL_SET_ANT_ROTATOR_DATA:
00380                                         for (unsigned char i=0;i<4;i++) {
00381                                                 antenna_ptr->rotator_addr[i] = computer_comm.rx_buffer[ptr_pos++];
00382                                                 antenna_ptr->rotator_sub_addr[i] = computer_comm.rx_buffer[ptr_pos++];
00383                                                 antenna_ptr->rotator_max_rotation[i] = computer_comm.rx_buffer[ptr_pos++] << 8;
00384                                                 antenna_ptr->rotator_max_rotation[i] += computer_comm.rx_buffer[ptr_pos++];
00385                                                 antenna_ptr->rotator_min_heading[i] = computer_comm.rx_buffer[ptr_pos++] << 8;
00386                                                 antenna_ptr->rotator_min_heading[i] += computer_comm.rx_buffer[ptr_pos++];
00387                                                 antenna_ptr->rotator_delay[i] = computer_comm.rx_buffer[ptr_pos++];
00388                                         }
00389                                         
00390                                         antenna_ptr->rotator_view_360_deg = computer_comm.rx_buffer[ptr_pos++];
00391                                         
00392                                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00393                                         break;
00394                                 case CTRL_SET_ANT_DEFAULT_INDEX:
00395                                         antenna_ptr->default_antenna = computer_comm.rx_buffer[2];
00396                                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00397                                         break;  
00398                                 case CTRL_SET_ANT_SUB_MENU_DATA:
00399                                         if (antenna_ptr->sub_menu_type[(int)computer_comm.rx_buffer[1]] == SUBMENU_VERT_ARRAY) {
00400                                                 sub_menu_array_ptr[(int)computer_comm.rx_buffer[1]]->direction_count = computer_comm.rx_buffer[2];
00401                                         }
00402                                         else if (antenna_ptr->sub_menu_type[(int)computer_comm.rx_buffer[1]] == SUBMENU_STACK) {
00403                                         
00404                                         }
00405                                         
00406                                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00407                                         break;
00408                                 case CTRL_SET_ANT_SUB_MENU_TEXT:
00409                                         if (antenna_ptr->sub_menu_type[(int)computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[1]] == SUBMENU_VERT_ARRAY) {
00410                                                 for (unsigned char i=0;i<computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[3];i++)
00411                                                         sub_menu_array_ptr[(int)computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[1]]->direction_name[(int)computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2]][i] = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[4+i];
00412                                         }
00413                                         
00414                                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00415                                         break;
00416                                 case CTRL_SET_ANT_SUB_MENU_OUTPUT_STR:
00417                                         if (antenna_ptr->sub_menu_type[(int)computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[1]] == SUBMENU_VERT_ARRAY) {
00418                                                 sub_menu_array_ptr[(int)computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[1]]->output_str_dir_length[(int)computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2]] = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[3];
00419                                                 
00420                                                 for (unsigned char i=0;i<computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[3];i++)
00421                                                         sub_menu_array_ptr[(int)computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[1]]->output_str_dir[(int)computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2]][i] = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[4+i];
00422                                         }
00423                                         
00424                                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00425                                         break;
00426                                 case CTRL_SET_ANT_DATA_SAVE:
00427                                         //Save the antenna structure to the eeprom
00428                                         eeprom_save_ant_structure(computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[1]+1, antenna_ptr);
00429                                         
00430                                         //Routines to save the SUB MENU data to the EEPROM
00431                                         for (unsigned char ant_index=0;ant_index<4;ant_index++) {
00432                                                 if (antenna_ptr->sub_menu_type[ant_index] == SUBMENU_VERT_ARRAY) {
00433                                                         eeprom_save_ant_sub_menu_array_structure(computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[1]+1, ant_index, sub_menu_array_ptr[ant_index]);
00434                                                 }
00435                                         }
00436                                         
00437                                         //Reset the content of the antenna_ptr
00438                                         memset(antenna_ptr,0,sizeof(struct_antenna));
00439                                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00440                                         break;
00441                                 default:
00442                                         computer_interface_send_nack();
00443                                         break;
00444                         }
00445                 }
00446                 else if (computer_comm.command == CTRL_SET_RX_ANT_DATA) {
00447                         switch(computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[0]) {
00448                                 case CTRL_SET_RX_ANT_DATA_TEXT:
00449                                         rx_antenna_ptr->name_length[(int)computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2]] = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[3];
00450                                         
00451                                         if (computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[3] == 0)
00452                                                 rx_antenna_ptr->name[(int)computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2]][0] = 0;
00453                                         else
00454                                                 for (unsigned char i=0;i<computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[3];i++)
00455                                                         rx_antenna_ptr->name[(int)computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2]][i] = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[4+i];
00456                                         
00457                                         rx_antenna_ptr->name[(int)computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2]][(int)computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[3]] = 0;
00458                                         
00459                                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00460                                         break;
00461                                 case CTRL_SET_RX_ANT_DATA_ANT_OUT_STR: 
00462                                         //Antenna index bit is use for which combination that should be chosen
00463                                         rx_antenna_ptr->output_length[(int)computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[1]] = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2];
00464                                         
00465                                         for (int i=0;i<computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2];i++) {
00466                                                 rx_antenna_ptr->output_str[(int)computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[1]][i] = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[3+i];
00467                                         }
00468                                         
00469                                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00470                                         break;
00471                                 case CTRL_SET_RX_ANT_DATA_BAND_OUT_STR:
00472                                         rx_antenna_ptr->band_output_length[(int)computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[1]] = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2];
00473                                         
00474                                         for (int i=0;i<computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2];i++) {
00475                                                 rx_antenna_ptr->band_output_str[(int)computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[1]][i] = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[3+i];
00476                                         }
00477 
00478                                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00479                                         break;
00480                                 case CTRL_SET_RX_ANT_DATA_SAVE:
00481                                         eeprom_save_rx_ant_structure(rx_antenna_ptr);
00482                                         
00483                                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00484                                         break;
00485                                 default:
00486                                         computer_interface_send_nack();
00487                                         break;                                  
00488                         }
00489                 }
00490                 else if (computer_comm.command == CTRL_CREATE_EEPROM_TABLE) {
00491                         eeprom_create_table();
00492                         
00493                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00494                 }
00495                 else if (computer_comm.command == CTRL_SET_RADIO_SETTINGS) {
00496                         /* Data structure for changing settings in the radio interface
00497                            byte 0   = sub command, see CTRL_SET_RADIO_SETTINGS_X defines
00498                                  byte 1..x = data
00499                         */
00500                         switch(computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[0]) {
00501                                 case CTRL_SET_RADIO_SETTINGS_ALL:
00502                                         radio_settings_ptr->radio_model = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[1];
00503                                         radio_settings_ptr->interface_type = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2];
00504                                         radio_settings_ptr->cat_enabled = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[3];
00505                                         radio_settings_ptr->baudrate = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[4];
00506                                         radio_settings_ptr->stopbits = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[5];
00507                                         radio_settings_ptr->civ_addr = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[6];
00508                                         radio_settings_ptr->poll_interval = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[7];
00509                                         radio_settings_ptr->ptt_input = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[8];
00510                                         
00511                                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00512                                         break;
00513                                 case CTRL_SET_RADIO_SETTINGS_SAVE:
00514                                         eeprom_save_radio_settings_structure(radio_settings_ptr);
00515                                         
00516                                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00517                                         break;
00518                                 default:        //If sub command not found
00519                                         computer_interface_send_nack();
00520                                         break;
00521                         }
00522                 }
00523                 else if (computer_comm.command == CTRL_SET_SEQUENCER_SETTINGS) {
00534                         switch(computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[0]) {
00535                                 case CTRL_SET_SEQUENCER_FOOTSWITCH:
00536                                         ptt_sequencer_ptr->footswitch.radio_pre_delay = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[1];
00537                                         ptt_sequencer_ptr->footswitch.radio_post_delay = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2];
00538                                         ptt_sequencer_ptr->footswitch.amp_pre_delay = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[3];
00539                                         ptt_sequencer_ptr->footswitch.amp_post_delay = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[4];
00540                                         ptt_sequencer_ptr->footswitch.inhibit_pre_delay = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[5];
00541                                         ptt_sequencer_ptr->footswitch.inhibit_post_delay = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[6];
00542                                         ptt_sequencer_ptr->footswitch.antennas_post_delay = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[7];
00543                                         ptt_sequencer_ptr->footswitch.active = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[8];
00544                                         ptt_sequencer_ptr->ptt_input |= computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[9];
00545                                         
00546                                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00547                                         break;
00548                                 case CTRL_SET_SEQUENCER_COMPUTER:
00549                                         ptt_sequencer_ptr->computer.radio_pre_delay = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[1];
00550                                         ptt_sequencer_ptr->computer.radio_post_delay = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2];
00551                                         ptt_sequencer_ptr->computer.amp_pre_delay = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[3];
00552                                         ptt_sequencer_ptr->computer.amp_post_delay = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[4];
00553                                         ptt_sequencer_ptr->computer.inhibit_pre_delay = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[5];
00554                                         ptt_sequencer_ptr->computer.inhibit_post_delay = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[6];
00555                                         ptt_sequencer_ptr->computer.antennas_post_delay = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[7];
00556                                         ptt_sequencer_ptr->computer.active = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[8];
00557                                         ptt_sequencer_ptr->ptt_input |= computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[9];
00558                                         
00559                                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00560                                         break;
00561                                 case CTRL_SET_SEQUENCER_RADIO_SENSE:
00562                                         ptt_sequencer_ptr->radio_sense.radio_pre_delay = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[1];
00563                                         ptt_sequencer_ptr->radio_sense.radio_post_delay = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2];
00564                                         ptt_sequencer_ptr->radio_sense.amp_pre_delay = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[3];
00565                                         ptt_sequencer_ptr->radio_sense.amp_post_delay = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[4];
00566                                         ptt_sequencer_ptr->radio_sense.antennas_post_delay = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[7];
00567                                         ptt_sequencer_ptr->radio_sense.active = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[8];
00568                                         ptt_sequencer_ptr->ptt_input |= computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[9];
00569                                         
00570                                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00571                                         break;
00572                                 case CTRL_SET_SEQUENCER_SAVE:
00573                                         eeprom_save_ptt_data(ptt_sequencer_ptr);
00574                                         
00575                                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00576                                         break;
00577                                 default:
00578                                         computer_interface_send_nack();
00579                                         break;
00580                         }
00581                 }                       
00582                 else if (computer_comm.command == CTRL_SET_DEVICE_SETTINGS) {
00583                         switch(computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[0]) {
00584                                 case CTRL_SET_DEVICE_SETTINGS_NETWORK:
00585                                         settings_ptr->network_address = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[1];
00586                                         settings_ptr->network_device_count = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2];
00587                                         settings_ptr->network_device_is_master = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[3];
00588                                         
00589                                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00590                                         break;
00591                                 case CTRL_SET_DEVICE_SETTINGS_EXT_INPUTS:
00592                                         for (unsigned char i=0;i<17;i++) {
00593                                                 settings_ptr->ext_key_assignments[i] = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[i+1];
00594                                         }
00595                                         
00596                                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00597                                         break;
00598                                 case CTRL_SET_DEVICE_SETTINGS_OTHER:
00599                                         settings_ptr->ptt_interlock_input = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[1];
00600                                         
00601                                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00602                                         break;                                  
00603                                 case CTRL_SET_POWERMETER_SETTINGS:
00604                                                 settings_ptr->powermeter_address = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[1];
00605                                                 settings_ptr->powermeter_vswr_limit = (computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2] << 8);
00606                                                 settings_ptr->powermeter_vswr_limit += computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[3];
00607                                                 settings_ptr->powermeter_update_rate_text = (computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[4] << 8);
00608                                                 settings_ptr->powermeter_update_rate_text += computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[5];
00609                                                 settings_ptr->powermeter_update_rate_bargraph = (computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[6] << 8);
00610                                                 settings_ptr->powermeter_update_rate_bargraph += computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[7];
00611                                                 
00612                                                 computer_interface_send_ack();
00613                                         break;
00614                                 case CTRL_SET_DEVICE_SETTINGS_SAVE:
00615                                         eeprom_save_settings_structure(settings_ptr);
00616                                         
00617                                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00618                                         break;
00619                                 default:        //If sub command not found, send NACK back to the computer
00620                                         computer_interface_send_nack();
00621                                         break;
00622                         }
00623                 }
00624                 else if (computer_comm.command == CTRL_SET_BAND_DATA) {
00625                         /* 1st byte = What kind of data
00626                                  2nd byte = Band index
00627                         */
00628                         
00629                         /*      Band limits (in data)
00630                                 ---------------------
00631                                         byte[0..1] = low_portion_low_limit
00632                                         byte[2..3] = low_portion_high_limit
00633                                         byte[4..5] = high_portion_low_limit
00634                                         byte[6..7] = high_portion_high_limit
00635                         */
00636                         
00637                         switch(computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[0]) {
00638                                 case CTRL_SET_BAND_DATA_LIMITS:
00639                                         band_ptr->low_portion_low_limit = (int)(((int)(computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2])<<8) + (int)computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[3]);
00640                                         band_ptr->low_portion_high_limit = (int)(((int)(computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[4])<<8) + (int)computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[5]);
00641                                         band_ptr->high_portion_low_limit = (int)(((int)(computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[6])<<8) + (int)computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[7]);
00642                                         band_ptr->high_portion_high_limit = (int)(((int)(computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[8])<<8) + (int)computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[9]);
00643                                         
00644                                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00645                                         break;
00646                                 case CTRL_SET_BAND_DATA_LOW_OUT_STR:
00647                                         band_ptr->band_low_output_str_length = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2];
00648 
00649                                         for (int i=0;i<computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2];i++)
00650                                                 band_ptr->band_low_output_str[i] = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[3+i];
00651                                         
00652                                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00653                                         break;
00654                                 case CTRL_SET_BAND_DATA_HIGH_OUT_STR:
00655                                         band_ptr->band_high_output_str_length = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2];
00656                                         
00657                                         for (int i=0;i<computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[2];i++)
00658                                                 band_ptr->band_high_output_str[i] = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[3+i];
00659 
00660                                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00661                                         break;
00662                                 case CTRL_SET_BAND_DATA_SAVE:
00663                                         eeprom_save_band_data(computer_comm.rx_buffer_start[1]+1,band_ptr);
00664                                         
00665                                         //Reset the content of the band_ptr
00666                                         memset(band_ptr,0,sizeof(struct_band));
00667                                         
00668                                         computer_interface_send_ack();
00669                                         break;
00670                                 default:
00671                                         computer_interface_send_nack();
00672                                         break;
00673                         }
00674                 }
00675                 else
00676                         computer_interface_send_nack();
00677         
00678                 //Clear the RX flag
00679                 computer_comm.flags &= ~(1<<COMPUTER_COMM_FLAG_DATA_IN_RX_BUF);
00680                 computer_comm.rx_buffer = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start;
00681         }
00682 }
00683 
00686 unsigned char computer_interface_is_active(void) {
00687         return((computer_comm.flags & (1<<COMPUTER_COMM_FLAG_SETUP_MODE))>>COMPUTER_COMM_FLAG_SETUP_MODE);
00688 }
00689 
00691 void computer_interface_activate_setup(void) {
00692         computer_comm.flags = (1<<COMPUTER_COMM_FLAG_SETUP_MODE);
00693         
00694         //Create dummy structures
00695         antenna_ptr = (struct_antenna *)malloc(sizeof(struct_antenna));
00696         rx_antenna_ptr = (struct_rx_antennas *)malloc(sizeof(struct_rx_antennas));
00697         band_ptr = (struct_band *)malloc(sizeof(struct_band));
00698         settings_ptr = (struct_setting *)malloc(sizeof(struct_setting));
00699         ptt_sequencer_ptr = (struct_ptt *)malloc(sizeof(struct_ptt));
00700         radio_settings_ptr = (struct_radio_settings *)malloc(sizeof(struct_radio_settings));
00701         
00702         for (unsigned char i=0;i<4;i++)
00703                 sub_menu_array_ptr[i] = (struct_sub_menu_array *)malloc(sizeof(struct_sub_menu_array));
00704         
00705         ptt_sequencer_ptr->ptt_input = 0;
00706 }
00707 
00709 void computer_interface_deactivate_setup(void) {
00710         computer_comm.flags &= ~(1<<COMPUTER_COMM_FLAG_SETUP_MODE);
00711         
00712         free(ptt_sequencer_ptr);
00713         free(antenna_ptr);
00714         free(rx_antenna_ptr);
00715         free(band_ptr);
00716         free(radio_settings_ptr);
00717 }
00718 
00719 ISR(SIG_USART1_DATA) {
00720         
00721 }
00722 
00724 ISR(SIG_USART1_RECV) {
00725         unsigned char data = UDR1;
00726 
00727         //Check if the openASC is in setup mode
00728         if (computer_interface_is_active()) {
00729                 //Has a preamble been found?
00730                 if (computer_comm.flags & (1<<COMPUTER_COMM_FLAG_FOUND_PREAMBLE)) {
00731                         //Check if the data is a postamble
00732                         if ((data == COMPUTER_COMM_POSTAMBLE) && ((computer_comm.count-2) == computer_comm.length)) {
00733                                 computer_comm.rx_buffer = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start;
00734                                 
00735                                 computer_comm.flags |= (1<<COMPUTER_COMM_FLAG_DATA_IN_RX_BUF);
00736                                 computer_comm.flags &= ~(1<<COMPUTER_COMM_FLAG_FOUND_PREAMBLE);
00737                         }
00738                         else {
00739                                 switch(computer_comm.count) {
00740                                         case 0: 
00741                                                 computer_comm.command = data;
00742                                                 break;
00743                                         case 1: 
00744                                                 computer_comm.length += data;
00745                                                 break;
00746                                         default:
00747                                                 *(computer_comm.rx_buffer++) = data;
00748                                                 break;
00749                                 }
00750 
00751                                 computer_comm.count++;
00752                         }
00753                 }
00754                 else if ((computer_comm.rx_buffer - computer_comm.rx_buffer_start > 0) && (data == COMPUTER_COMM_PREAMBLE)
00755                                                 && (*(computer_comm.rx_buffer-1) == COMPUTER_COMM_PREAMBLE)) {
00756                         computer_comm.rx_buffer = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start;
00757                         computer_comm.flags &= ~(1<<COMPUTER_COMM_FLAG_DATA_IN_RX_BUF);
00758                         computer_comm.flags |= (1<<COMPUTER_COMM_FLAG_FOUND_PREAMBLE);
00759                         
00760                         computer_comm.count = 0;
00761                         computer_comm.length = 0;
00762                 }
00763                 else {
00764                         if ((computer_comm.rx_buffer - computer_comm.rx_buffer_start) >= COMPUTER_RX_BUFFER_LENGTH) {
00765                                 computer_comm.rx_buffer = computer_comm.rx_buffer_start;
00766                         }
00767                         else {
00768                                 *(computer_comm.rx_buffer++) = data;
00769                         }
00770                 }
00771         }
00772         else {
00773                 //TODO: Implement a buffer which does save the data sent from the computer and then after the box has receieved its answer
00774                 //      that data will be sent.
00775                 if (radio_get_cat_status() == 0)
00776                         usart3_transmit(data);
00777         }
00778 }
